title: Women Techmakers Montreal 2025
shortDescription: **"Redefine Possible"** is a bold declaration that **challenges the boundaries of what technology can achieve and reimagines who shapes its future.**
longDescription: We stand at a pivotal moment where AI is transforming our world—bringing unprecedented opportunities but also risking the amplification of gender biases and systemic barriers. As artificial intelligence becomes woven into society, we believe that women are not just participating in its development—they're revolutionizing it, breaking conventions, and **expanding the horizons of what technology can and should be.**
